title: The Role of the Central Element in the Quantum Algebra Underlying the Twisted XXZ Chain
abstract: We study the relationship among the XXZ Heisenberg model and three models obtained from it by various transformations. In particular, we emphasize the role of a non trivial central element $t^Z$ in the underlying algebra and its relationship with the twisted boundary conditions, $S^{\pm}_{N+1}=t^{\pm N}S^{\pm}_1$.
